css:
<style>
.print-format {
    margin-left:05mm;
    margin-top:05mm;
    margin-right:05mm;
    margin-bottom:05mm;
    page-size: A6;
}
.print-format td, .print-format th {
    vertical-align: top !important;
    padding: 0.5px !important;
}
@media screen {
    .print-format {
    /*PRINTABLE WIDTH: 21.0cm */
    width: 4in;
    /*PRINTABLE HEIGHT: 29.7cm*/
    /*PADDING FROM MARGINS: 0.9cm, .354331in */
    padding: 0.5cm;
    }
    }
.float-container {
    border: 3px solid #fff;
    padding: 2px;
}

.float-child {
    width: 50%;
    float: left;
    padding: 2px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}
.blue{
    text-align:right;
}
.float-child-2{
    width: 50%;
    float:left;
    padding:2px;
}
.float-container-2 {
    padding: 5px;
}
.head-section{
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}
</style>
